USE CASE: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to add a listing of students to a cohort.
The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to add a single student to a cohort.
The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to specify a sequence of classes for a cohort.
The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to specify the quarter for a class.
add new classes
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to add new classes to a sequence of classes.

USE CASE: add clinical classes or sections
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to add clinical classes or sections to a sequence of classes.

USE CASE: add a new cohort to the system
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows to add a new cohort to the system identified by start month and year.

USE CASE: add new classes for the nursing department into the system
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to add new classes for the nursing department into the system.

USE CASE: create a new program of study
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to create a new program of study.

USE CASE: specify classes for a program of study
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to specify classes for a program of study.

USE CASE: add a new clinical site into the system
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to add a new clinical site into the system.

USE CASE: add a new clinical lab section
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to add a new clinical lab section for an existing clinical.

USE CASE: add a student to a clinical lab section
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to add a student to a clinical lab section.

USE CASE: remove a student from a clinical lab section
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to remove a student to a clinical lab section.

USE CASE: move a student to another a clinical lab section
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to move a student to another a clinical lab section.

USE CASE: cancel a clinical lab section
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to cancel a clinical lab section.

USE CASE: add a new nursing student to the system
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to add a new nursing student to the system.

USE CASE: manage part-time student progress
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows a Staff Member to manage part-time student progress.

USE CASE: modify information relating to cohorts
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to modify information relating to cohorts including cohort identifier program of study preferred sequence of classes program.

USE CASE: modify information to a program of study
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to modify information to a program of study within the Nursing Department including the Program of study name program.

USE CASE: modify information to a clinical site
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to modify information to a clinical site including the clinical site name site contact person contact information.

USE CASE: modify information to a clinical lab section
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to modify information to a clinical lab section including the clinical site name the department/section for the lab the class instructor day.

USE CASE: modify information to a nursing student
DESCRIPTION: The UC describe the functionality that allows Program Administrators and Nursing Staff to modify information to a nursing student including student ID student name phone number e-mail status.
